title: Chikalicious
description: Collaboration project with UX designers and developers. Developed with ReactJs and JavaScript. The user interface is implemented with CSS3. Responsive design for mobile screens.
technology: HTML5 | CSS3 | ReactJS | Zeplin | Responsive Design

title: Dance Studio
description: Content Management system for the Dance Studio. It's a full stack aplication. Instructors/users logs in to: add/edit/delete new classes. Built Ruby on Rails API with endpoints for users, categories and dances.
technology: Ruby on Rails backend API | ReactJS | React Router | JWT | BCrypt | Postgresql | Heroku | CSS3 | Responsive Design

title: Tech Blog App
description: Tech Blog for newbies in tech world. Users can log in and create/edit/delete posts. Tech Blog is a full stack application. It was developed with Express backend API, ReactJS, JavaScript, React Router, Mongoose, MongoDB. An authentication system was developed with Express on backend and Json Web Token and local storage onthe client side. The user interface is build with fully CSS styling
technology: ReactJS | ExpressJS | JWT | MongoDB | Heroku | Mongoose | CSS3 | Responsive Design

title: Planets App
description: App is for educational purposes about the Space and browsing images from NASA Api. User interface is fully CSS3
technology: HTML5 | CSS3 | Vanilla JavaScript | NASA API | Responsive Design

title: Photo Lover
description: An App where you can Search Images and pin your favorites to the board. Developed with ReactJS, React Router, Jest Enzyme testing. All data is pulled from the Unsplash API and from it, implemented search features. The user interface is fully CSS3. Responsive on 3 screens.
technology: HTML5 | CSS3 | ReactJS | React Router | Unsplash API | Responsive Design

title: Photography Website
description: Upload images to your portfolio website. Through out this project I learnt how to connect SQL database and PHP backend, deploy the website using Filezilla to a school server

title: Community Center
description: Redesign of community center outdated website with Bootstrap. Responsive on three screens.
technology: HTML5 | CSS3 | Bootstrap | JQuery | Responsive Design
